text: Modaronaton va duxtaronaton va xoharonaton va ammahojaton va xolahojaton va duxtaroni ʙarodaron va duxtaroni xoharonaton va zanone, ki sumoro sir dodaand va xoharoni sirijaton va modaroni zanonaton ʙar sumo harom sudaand. Va duxtaroni zanonaton, ki dar kanori sumo hastand, har goh ʙo on zanon hamʙistar sudaed, ʙar sumo harom sudaand. Vale agar hamʙistar nasudaed, gunohe murtakiʙ nasudaed. Va niz zanoni pisarone, ki az pusti sumo hastand, ʙar sumo harom sudaand. Va naʙojad du xoharro dar jak zamon ʙa zani gired, ƣajri on ki pes az in cunin karda ʙosed. Alʙatta Xudo omurzarda va mehruʙon ast
